studies.title: Bachelor's Degree in Mechanical Engineering
studies.subtitle: 2013 - 2016 (not finished)
description: The first time I entered the university, I opted for Mechanical Engineering. I was interested in motorsports, so my objective was toend up designing race cars. However, in my third year I understood that I had not enough motivation, and I left the degree.
During these three years I learnd a lot about maths and physics, two subjects I love.

studies.title: Bachelor's Degree in Telecommunications Tecnologies Engineering
studies.subtitle: 2017 - 2018 (not finished)
description: After one year thinking about my future, I decided to sign up in Telecommunications Engineering. My intention was to find out if I really liked programming and IT, and I actually did.
During this year I learned C, Mathlab and electronics fundamentals, and got honors in Statistics, Programming (C) and Physics (Electronics).

studies.title: Bachelor's Degree in Computer Engineering
description: In 2018 I decided to move to other town and started to study Computer Engineering. I really enjoyed these years, and discovered my passion as a developer
I got honors in Programming (Java), Automatons & Forming Languages and Digital Content Creation.

studies.title: Master's Degree in Indie Videogames Development
description: I have always dreamed about working as videogame developer. I have played videogames since I have memory, and I have always thought that they are a wonderful way of artistic expression.
Therefore, this degree is the first step I need to become a game developer, and to get to know the artist inside me.
